title: Clean and Quiet Transport - Airwheel intelligent personal transportation Electric Scooters
text: Clean and Quiet Transport - Airwheel intelligent personal transportation Electric Scooters Under the context of globalization, the competition over energy resources is of great significance. Therefore, clean and energy-saving transportation manner is well advocated among the public. As to clean transports, Airwheel electric scooters must be mentioned then, which is green and eco-friendly in a true sense. USA, 30 September 2015 -- Under the current context of globalization, it is of great significance to compete over energy resources. In respect of transportation, clean and energy-saving transports are thus well advocated. As one of these transports, Airwheel electric scooter is known as a green and eco-friendly transport in a true sense.Airwheel self-balancing electric scooter is powered by electricity, a clean and renewable energy source. On that account, it doesn’t pollute the environment at all and leave no exhaust during the ride. Besides, since the self-balancing scooter adopts fine lithium batteries imported from Sony, it can be recharged for 1800 times and have a longer lifespan than others. What’s more, the battery enables the vehicle to have a long range of up to 48 km. There is no need for riders to worry whether they will suffer from blackout out of sudden. Also, thanks to the high technology of Airwheel core team, the vehicle is rather energy-saving in that it only consumes 1 kWh for one hundred miles, which has outperformed a lot of other electric vehicles. Without any doubt, riding such a clean vehicle will surely relieve the shortage of natural energy resources like gasoline. In this way, it will in return contribute to the harmony of the globe. What’s more, Airwheel intelligent scooter is not only energy-saving but also quiet in operation. Generally, while a transport is running, it will produce some noises which may be even very harsh. Sometimes, this kind of noise may be very irritating and annoying. On the contrary, since Airwheelintelligent scooter is mounted with magnetic levitation motor, it will not generate any noise during the ride, which shows the true meaning of “green”. With such a vehicle, riders are able to enjoy a quiet ride and meanwhile have no impact on the passers-by. Clean and quiet, Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter is absolutely the leading transport in the world that echoes with the current trend. # # #
